author: Patrick Bet-David
title: 12 Ways to Inspect and Improve Your Business | Online Business Ideas for Entrepreneurs | Business Plan, Resources, Tips and Strategy | Entrepreneur Philippines
text:
12 Ways to Inspect and Improve Your Business You should be keeping track of every aspect of your businessâ€”every day 


In this video, Entrepreneur Network partner Patrick Bet-David underscores the importance of monitoring and inspecting your business. 

Do you know how your business is doing? Bet-David enumerates the 12 facets of your business that you need to inspect, from your team to your sales flow to your brand. 

Every aspect of your business plays a crucial role in its success. Examine your team to determine whether you should hire more people or whether a specific department needs attention. 

When it comes to sales flow, ask yourself: Are you consistently offering enough to your customers? Are you making enough sales? 

With branding, it's important to make sure that you're telling an established story and developing a positive reputation. 

To learn more about how to monitor your business, click play on the video above.
